titles.title: God Will Take Care Of You

authors.author: Civilla D. Martin Walter Stillman Martin

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
God will take care of you.
Thro' every day, o'er all the way,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
He will take care of you;
God will take care of you.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Be not dismayed whate'er betide,
God will take care of you;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Beneath His wings of love abide,
God will take care of you.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
When dangers fierce your path assail,
God will take care of you.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
All you may need He will provide,
God will take care of you;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Nothing you ask will be denied,
God will take care of you.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
No matter what may be the test,
God will take care of you;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Lean, weary one, upon His breast,
God will take care of you.
